name: AMAS Development Environment
postCreateCommand: set -euxo pipefail; if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install --no-input --progress-bar off -r requirements.txt || exit 1; else echo '?? Warning: requirements.txt not found'; exit 1; fi; if [ -f requirements-dev.txt ]; then pip install --no-input --progress-bar off -r requirements-dev.txt && echo '? Dependencies installed' && python -c "import sys; print(f'Python {sys.version}')"; else echo '?? requirements-dev.txt not found (optional)'; python -c "import sys; print(f'Python {sys.version}')"; fi
onCreateCommand: if [ -f .env.example ]; then cp .env.example .env && echo '? Created .env from .env.example'; else echo '? Warning: .env.example not found. Create .env manually.'; fi
